title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 70 - Change Of Beer Prices To Wholesale And Retail Licensees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 70 - Change Of Beer Prices To Wholesale And Retail Licensees

State Regulations
§ 70.1 - Change in beer prices
§ 70.2 - Waivers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 70

Statutory authority: Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, §55-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
